| History                 = The Wolf Spider Spetsnaz were the [[Kremlin]]'s top wet work team. After the [[Winter Guard (Earth-616)|Winter Guard]] captured the [[Jennifer Walters (Earth-616)|Hulk (Jen Walters)]] and brought her to Russia to be conditioned in a military compound in [[Siberia]], the Wolf Spider Spetsnaz were tasked with guarding it. When the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]] broke into the base, [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Iron Man]] exploited their armor's ear holes, shooting sniper-caliber repulsor blasts into their helmets to knock them all down.{{r|Avengers Vol 8 47}}
